suspects.description: Known for his sharp intellect and keen investigative skills.
Trusted companion and chronicler of Sherlock Holmes' adventures.
In charge of security and preservation of the Emerald Mask, potentially involved in its disappearance.
Mastermind behind various high-profile art thefts, suspected of orchestrating the mask's disappearance.
On duty during the night of the theft, under scrutiny for any lapses in security.
Known to have a fascination with historical artifacts, a potential buyer for the stolen mask.
Employee with grievances against the museum, possibly seeking revenge through the theft.
Believes in supernatural explanations, investigating the peculiar sightings near the museum.
Known for his brilliant deductive skills and solving intricate mysteries.
Trusted companion and chronicler of Sherlock Holmes' cases.
Responsible for the manuscript's safekeeping, potentially involved in its disappearance.
Expert in ancient texts and occult knowledge, likely interested in the missing manuscript.
Studying the manuscript's contents, possibly holding valuable insights into its significance.
Suspected of harboring jealousy towards those studying the manuscript, potentially involved in its theft.
Looking into the strange occurrences at the university, seeking to uncover any supernatural elements.
Known for delving into forbidden knowledge, potentially having access to the manuscript.
Notorious for his deductive reasoning and solving complex cases.
Trusted companion and chronicler of Sherlock Holmes' adventures.
In charge of the Ebon Dagger exhibit at the museum, potentially involved in its disappearance.
Suspected practitioner of the occult, possibly linked to the mystical properties of the Ebon Dagger.
Claims to have foreseen the dagger's theft and the ensuing murders, raising suspicion of premeditation.
Expert in ancient symbols and artifacts, sought after for insights into the cryptic markings found.
Involved in a longstanding feud with the family owning the Ebon Dagger, a potential motive for theft.
Investigating the unexplained weather anomalies, potentially tied to the supernatural aspects of the case.
